name: Stronger Together (QuinnCG)
description:
A small colony management game made as part of the Brackey's 2022.2 Game Jam.

Select a target and any of your colony members that have the required tools will interact with your selection. You don't tell which colony members to do what, just what should be done and they'll decide who does it.

Controls:

  • Left Mouse to select
  • Right Mouse (hold) to pan camera

Help:

Picking up the small stones on the ground requires no tools.
